Description: Blue glazed composition conical rhyton imitating a Minoan shape; single handle beneath rim and black decoration beneath rim.
Cultures/periods: Nubia and Sudan periods and cultures
Bibliographic references: Koehl 2006 / Aegean Bronze Age Rhyta (Cat. no. E1, p. 238)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2003 10 Apr-31 Aug, Barcelona, CaixaForum, Nubia: Los reinos del Nilo en Sudan 2003/4 23 Sep-4 Jan, Madrid, Sala de Exposiciones de la Fundacio, Nubia: Los reinos del Nilo en Sudan
